clinical_study.brief_title: Informed Decision Users of the Health System and Participation in Organized Screening for Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Informed Decision Users of the Health System and Participation in Organized Screening for Breast Cancer : a Qualitative Analysis

lead_sponsor.agency: Institut de Cancérologie de la Loire

clinical_study.source: Institut de Cancérologie de la Loire

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to assess the impact of a decision aid leaflet on the participation of women invited to participate in the French national breast cancer screening program.

primary_outcome.measure: women's attendance rate for the breast cancer screening program during the 12 months following the invitation

secondary_outcome.measure: the delay between the invitation and the date of attendance for breast cancer screening

arm_group.description: Women allocated to the decision aid group received an invitation to participate in the national breast cancer screening program and the specially-designed decision aid (a leaflet), by mail.
Women in the control group received an invitation and the usual standard information by mail.

intervention.description: The paper-based leaflet DECIDEO is a 12-page pocket leaflet providing scientific information about the advantages and disadvantages of participating in the national breast screening program, understandable by all, constructed to conform with the International Patient Decision Aid Standards

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women, aged between 50 and 74 years old living in 11 French departments
Exclusion Criteria:
